pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fish Migration Monitoring // Graphical outputs and treatment for a database of fish pass monitoring. It is a part of the 'STACOMI' open source project developed in France by the French Agency for Biodiversity (AFB) institute to centralize data obtained by fish pass monitoring. This version is available in French and English. See http://stacomir.r-forge.r-project.org/ for more information on 'STACOMI'.
